item.title: book-boyfriends
item.description: Fictional boys who would fall on the not-kill side of the fuck-marry-kill equation. See also: book wifes

item.title: book-wifes
item.description: Fictional characters to whom I would matrimony myself, of the female variety. See also: book boyfriends

item.title: crafty-bastards
item.description: What it says on the tin. Can include clever rascals, ingenious bitches, chaotic masterminds, or squirrelly motherfuckers.

item.title: manga
item.description: Japanese comics, usually black and white, and read right-to-left. Manga is still pulp fiction at heart. See also: manhua

item.title: manhua
item.description: Chinese comics (漫画, “impromptu drawings”). Heavily influenced by manga but often in color and read left-to-right.

item.title: pansexual
item.description: Adam: What, like… fucking pots and pans? Ola: No, you idiot.
